The `img` folder includes the following gifs to play with

```{r gifs}
list.files("img")
```

```{r show_gifs}
#| output: asis
#| echo: false
gifs <- list.files("img")
for(f in gifs){
cat("![](img/",f,")",sep="")
}
```


## More GIFs?

Head to [gifcities](https://gifcities.org/) and rediscover all your favorite gifs from the early internet age!
